title: Switching to Eigen version with HIP support.
body_html:
This PR does the following things.

  1. Update the Eigen commit pointer to the first Eigen version with HIP support

  2. Update TF codebase with changes necessitated by the API changes in the
    Eigen version with HIP support. Basically some APIs names/ header files
    were updated from Cuda to Gpu

  3. Resurrects the eigen patch file to workaround an eigen change (commit : 4af74f577a4fc09dcfa202064e1291038d2046da) which breaks the TF build
    There is bug filed on Eigen to track this failure
    http://eigen.tuxfamily.org/bz/show_bug.cgi?id=1569
    A recent eigen commit fixes that bug. The eiegn patch file can be removed once we advance the eigen commit pointer to a commit that contains the fix
body_text:
This PR does the following things.


Update the Eigen commit pointer to the first Eigen version with HIP support


Update TF codebase with changes necessitated by the API changes in the
Eigen version with HIP support. Basically some APIs names/ header files
were updated from Cuda to Gpu


Resurrects the eigen patch file to workaround an eigen change (commit : 4af74f577a4fc09dcfa202064e1291038d2046da) which breaks the TF build
There is bug filed on Eigen to track this failure
http://eigen.tuxfamily.org/bz/show_bug.cgi?id=1569
A recent eigen commit fixes that bug. The eiegn patch file can be removed once we advance the eigen commit pointer to a commit that contains the fix
body:
This PR does the following things.

1. Update the Eigen commit pointer to the first Eigen version with HIP support

2. Update TF codebase with changes necessitated by the API changes in the
   Eigen version with HIP support. Basically some APIs names/ header files
   were updated from *Cuda* to *Gpu*

3. Resurrects the eigen patch file to workaround an eigen change (commit : 4af74f577a4fc09dcfa202064e1291038d2046da) which breaks the TF build
   There is bug filed on Eigen to track this failure
   http://eigen.tuxfamily.org/bz/show_bug.cgi?id=1569
   A recent eigen commit fixes that bug. The eiegn patch file can be removed once we advance the eigen commit pointer to a commit that contains the fix
